author: Rondi Adamson
title: Trump Manages to Unify My Country
text:
The undefended border between the U.S. and Canada is porous. People pass freely, but so do infectious agents and syndromes. I’ve seen many in my time, mostly during Republican administrations. Few match the power or breadth of the Canadianized strain of Trump derangement syndrome. Whatever Mr. Trump does, Canadians are against it.

Take the North American Free Trade Agreement. Back in the early 1990s, Canadian unions, academics and “celebrities,” as well as Canada’s Liberal and New Democratic Parties, passionately argued against...
